post.author: 강재형
post.content:
Title: It (information technology) consultant (Oracle Financials 11i Dev) (NOC: 2171)  
Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time
Salary: To be negotiated
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto Centre, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Some university
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Certified Computer Programmer (CCP)
Experience: 3 - 5 years
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English
Management Systems (erp or db): Oracle / PL-SQL / CASE / Developer 2000 / Ingres
Other Information: Please respond only if you have Oracle 11i Applications development experience including CRM, Financials, and HRMS. Ideal candidates will have four (4) plus years experience with Oracle Applications development and have at least one (2) year experience with Oracle 11i applications including CRM and Familiarity with Installs and Patches. All candidates should possess excellent oral and written communication skills. References are required and will be verified along with work history.

Employer: 3K CONSULTING (Placement Agency)

How to Apply:  Contact Name: Derek Edwards
By E-mail: 3k.consulting@rogers.com

Advertised until: 2002/08/27
post.title: IT Consultant(Oracle 11i Dev.)
